reviewText: 4 great movies to add to my collection.
love them
Loved them all
Excellent!!!  Nice product, fast shipping and good quality!
LOVED "PRIDE OF THE YANKEES" AND TY COBB MOVIE WAS INTERSTING, BUT THE OTHER 2 MOVIES WEREN'T MY CUP OF TEA.
Good viewing.
Good collection of DVDs at an affordable price.  The movies vary in quality, but most baseball fans would enjoy.
Great baseball movies. A good value too.

I think these movies are more for drama lovers then baseball lovers. Unless you are a fan of the famous player. its more of a life story then the baseball story. I was hoping for more baseball action in the off season. so I give it an ok.
Fear Strikes Out & Pride Of The Yankees...Great. The other two...so-so.
excelente producto

I know I'm supposed to like, "Bang the Drum Slowly."  However, I felt like the plot was moving so slowly.  How many minutes did they show about the contract negotiation, just to get the plot point of "Whatever you do to him, you do to me."

Pride is a great film.  Cobb has it's moments.  Worth the purchase for those two.
Very happy
Great movies
Got for my grandson
Great for baseball fans!
cobb alone makes this a good buy
great movie
Great service and product!
A must for any baseball fan!! Pride of the Yankees and Fear Strikes Out will keep dad happy; and Bang the Drum & Cobb will appeal to younger ones. I love all of them!!
